entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy walked away, smirking over his shoulder at Harry, who suddenly felt sick.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry pulled out parchment and quill, crouched down beside the others, and related in a whisper what Malfoy had just said.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron and Hermione, who were squatting on the grass some distance away

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione at once. "It's just playing into Malfoy's hands to look worried, it tells him we don't know exactly what's going on."

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: His father was a Death Eater, after all; what if he had information about Hagrid's fate that had not yet reached the Order's ears?

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore would know if something had happened to Hagrid

relationships.description: Did Malfoy know something? His father was a Death Eater, after all; what if he had information about Hagrid's fate that had not yet reached the Order's ears?
Harry pulled out parchment and quill, crouched down beside the others, and related in a whisper what Malfoy had just said.
"Dumbledore would know if something had happened to Hagrid," said Hermione at once. "It's just playing into Malfoy's hands to look worried, it tells him we don't know exactly what's going on."
